onboarding.title: 钱包设置
onboarding.sync_desc: 如果您已有 MetaMask 扩展程序或其他钱包，请将其同步或导入以便管理您的现有资产。
onboarding.create_desc: 设置您的第一个钱包，并开始探索去中心化应用。
onboarding.import: 导入现有钱包或创建新钱包
onboarding.optin_back_desc: 请同意或不同意使用数据分析。您也可以在设置中更新此选项。
onboarding.warning_text_1: 如果继续，将删除您当前的
onboarding.warning_text_4: 您只能使用钱包的助记词恢复它们。MetaMask 无法帮助您恢复。
onboarding.sync_existing: 从浏览器扩展程序同步您的现有 MetaMask 钱包或手动导入钱包。
onboarding.scan_title: 与 MetaMask 扩展程序同步的步骤
onboarding.scan_step_1: 在桌面上打开扩展程序

onboarding_carousel.title3: 您通往 web3 的门户
onboarding_carousel.subtitle1: MetaMask 深受数百万人信任，是一款可以让所有人进入 web3 世界的安全钱包。
onboarding_carousel.subtitle2: 存储、支出和发送数字资产，如代币、以太币、独特收藏品。
onboarding_carousel.subtitle3: 使用 MetaMask 登录并进行交易，以便投资、赚钱、玩游戏、销售等！

step1.title: 欢迎使用您的新钱包！
step1.content1: 要使用区块链，您需要一个钱包！有些操作可能需要花费以太币 (ETH)。
step1.content2: 我们将为您演示如何购买 ETH，或者，您可以向朋友索要一些。

step2.title: 您的账户
step2.content1: 这是您的第一个账户、总价值及其唯一公共地址 (0x...)。
step2.content2: 通过点按个人资料图标，您可以在此钱包内创建多个账户。

step3.title: 编辑账户名
step3.content1: 为什么不给您的账户起一个好记又独特的名字呢？

step4.title: 主导航
step4.content2: 可访问您的钱包、浏览器和交易历史记录。
step4.content3: 您可以对账户执行更多操作及访问 MetaMask 设置。

step5.title: 探索浏览器
step5.content1: 您可以使用浏览器探索 web3

step6.title: 搜索
step6.content: 搜索站点；如果您知道要前往的目的地，键入 URL。

create_wallet.title: 正在创建您的钱包...
create_wallet.subtitle: 这应该不需要很长时间

import_wallet.title: 已经是 MetaMask 用户？
import_wallet.sync_help: 与扩展程序同步您的钱包
import_wallet.sync_from_browser_extension_button: 与 MetaMask 扩展程序同步

login.title: 欢迎回来！
login.cant_proceed: You can’t proceed till you type the word ‘Delete’. With this action you are opting in to erase your current wallet.
login.type_delete: Type ‘%{delete}’ to erase current wallet permanently
login.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to erase your wallet?
login.your_current_wallet: Your current wallet, accounts and assets will be
login.you_can_only: You can ONLY recover this wallet with your
login.metamask_does_not: MetaMask does not have your Secret Recovery Phrase.
login.vault_error: Error: Cannot unlock without a previous vault.
login.clean_vault_error: MetaMask encountered an error due to reaching a storage limit. The local data has been corrupted. Please reinstall MetaMask and restore with your Secret Recovery Phrase.

enter_password.title: 输入您的密码
enter_password.desc: 请输入您的密码以便继续

choose_password.title: 创建密码
choose_password.subtitle: 此密码将仅在此设备上解锁您的 MetaMask 钱包。
choose_password.password_length_error: 密码至少需要 8 个字符
choose_password.must_be_at_least: 必须至少包含 {{number}} 个字符
choose_password.security_alert_message: 若要继续，您需要开启密码或设备上支持的任何生物特征身份验证方法（FaceID、TouchID 或指纹）
choose_password.i_understand: 我了解 MetaMask 无法为我找回此密码。
choose_password.disable_biometric_error: You have disabled biometrics for the app. Update Remember Me settings and try again.

reset_password.title: 更改密码
reset_password.subtitle: 此密码将仅在此设备上解锁您的 MetaMask 钱包。
reset_password.password_length_error: 密码至少需要 8 个字符
reset_password.must_be_at_least: 必须至少包含 {{number}} 个字符
reset_password.security_alert_message: 若要继续，您需要开启密码或设备上支持的任何生物特征身份验证方法（FaceID、TouchID 或指纹）
reset_password.i_understand: 我了解 MetaMask 无法为我找回此密码。

import_from_seed.title: 从助记词导入
import_from_seed.password_length_error: 密码至少需要 8 个字符
import_from_seed.seed_phrase_requirements: 助记词包含 12、15、18、21 或 24 个字词
import_from_seed.invalid_qr_code_message: 此二维码不代表有效的助记词

drawer.submit_feedback_message: 选择要发送的反馈类型。

send.title: 发送
send.network_not_found_description: Network with chain id {{chain_id}} not found in your wallet. Please add the network first.

wallet.title: 钱包
wallet.nfts_autodetection_desc: Allow MetaMask to automatically detect NFTs from OpenSea and display in your MetaMask wallet.
wallet.nfts_autodetection_cta: Turn on NFT detection in Settings
wallet.token_removal_issue_desc: There was a problem when trying to remove the token. Try again.
wallet.token_removed_desc: 如果您改变主意，可以点按“+ 添加代币”重新添加。
wallet.collectible_removed_desc: 如果您改变主意，可以点按“+ 添加收藏品”重新添加。
wallet.logout_to_import_seed: 您需要先注销，然后才能导入助记词。
wallet.ready_to_explore: 准备开始探索区块链应用？

add_asset.title: 添加资产
add_asset.warning_body_description: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens. Learn more about
add_asset.token_detection_feature: New! Improved token detection is available on Ethereum Mainnet as an experimental feature.

terms_and_conditions.title: 条款和条件
terms_and_conditions.description: 继续即表示您同意这些

privacy_policy.title: 隐私政策
privacy_policy.description: 为满足欧盟第 2016/679 号条例《通用数据保护条例》的要求，此数据经过了聚合处理，因而成为匿名数据。有关我们的隐私保护操作的详细信息，请参阅我们的隐私政策
privacy_policy.description_content_1: MetaMask 希望收集基本的使用数据，以便更好地了解我们的用户如何与移动应用交互。这些数据将用于持续改进我们产品的可用性和用户体验。
privacy_policy.action_description_1: 始终允许您通过“设置”选择退出
privacy_policy.action_description_2: 发送匿名化点击和页面浏览事件
privacy_policy.action_description_3: Send country, region, city data (not specific location)
privacy_policy.action_description_4: 决不收集密钥、地址、交易、余额、哈希或任何个人信息
privacy_policy.action_description_5: 决不收集您的 IP 地址
privacy_policy.action_description_6: 决不出售数据牟利。绝对不会！

token.address_must_be_valid: 代币地址必须是有效地址。
token.decimals_cant_be_empty: 代币小数位数不能为空。
token.no_tokens_found: 我们无法找到具有该名称的任何代币。
token.address_must_be_smart_contract: 检测到个人地址。输入代币合约地址。

collectible.address_must_be_valid: 收藏品地址必须是有效地址。
collectible.address_must_be_smart_contract: 检测到个人地址。输入收藏品合约地址。
collectible.token_id_cant_be_empty: 收藏品标识符不能为空。
collectible.not_owner_error: 您不是此收藏品的所有者，因此不能添加它。
collectible.ownership_verification_error: We could not verify ownership. This may be because the standard is not supported or the asset does not exist on your selected network.

accounts.remove_account_message: 是否确实想要删除此账户？

app_settings.title: 设置
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_down: 您当前的 IPFS 网关发生故障
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_desc: 选择您的首选 IPFS 网关。
app_settings.auto_lock_desc: 选择应用程序自动锁定之前空闲的时间。
app_settings.state_logs_desc: 这将帮助 MetaMask 调试您可能遇到的任何问题。请通过电子邮件将其发送到 support@metamask.io
app_settings.clear_approvals_modal_message: 所有去中心化应用都将需要再次请求查看账户信息的访问权限。
app_settings.clear_browser_history_modal_message: 我们即将删除您的所有浏览器历史记录。您确定吗？
app_settings.clear_cookies_modal_message: 我们即将删除您的浏览器 Cookie。您确定吗？
app_settings.reset_account_modal_message: 重置账户将清除您的交易历史记录。
app_settings.invalid_rpc_prefix: URI 需要适当的 HTTPS 前缀
app_settings.sync_with_extension: 与 MetaMask 扩展程序同步
app_settings.sync_with_extension_desc: 这会将所有扩展程序账户导入此设备。
app_settings.clear_approved_dapps: 清除已批准的去中心化应用
app_settings.clear_approve_dapps_desc: 清除已批准的去中心化应用
app_settings.protect_desc: 为了保护您的钱包，请将助记词保存在不同的地点，如纸上、密码管理器中和/或云端。
app_settings.protect_desc_no_backup: This is your wallet’s 12 word phrase. This phrase can be used to take control of all your current and future accounts, including the ability to send away funds in your wallet. Keep this phrase stored safely, DO NOT share it with anyone. MetaMask cannot help you recover this key.
app_settings.privacy_mode_desc: 网站必须请求查看您的账户信息的访问权限。
app_settings.nft_opensea_desc: Displaying NFT media & data may expose your IP addresss to centralized servers. Use OpenSea's API to fetch NFT data. NFT auto-detection relies on OpenSea's API, and will not be available when this is turned off. Enabling NFT auto-detection can expose you to fake NFTs being sent to your wallet by anyone, and can allow an attacker to learn your IP address from your Ethereum address.
app_settings.nft_autodetect_desc: Displaying NFT media & data may expose your IP address to centralized servers. Third-party APIs (like OpenSea) are used to detect NFTs in your wallet. This exposes your account address with those services. Leave this disabled if you don't want the app to pull data from those services.
app_settings.show_hex_data_desc: 选择此项可在发送屏幕上显示十六进制数据字段。
app_settings.custom_nonce_desc: Turn this on to change the nonce (transaction number) on confirmation screens. This is an advanced feature, use cautiously.
app_settings.accounts_identicon_desc: 哈希头像是帮助您一眼识别账户的独特图标，有 Jazzicons 和 Blockies 两种不同风格。
app_settings.general_desc: 货币转换、主要货币、语言和搜索引擎
app_settings.advanced_desc: 访问开发人员功能、重置账户、设置测试网、状态日志、IPFS 网关和自定义 RPC
app_settings.contacts_desc: 添加、编辑、删除和管理您的账户
app_settings.security_desc: 隐私设置、MetaMetrics、私钥和钱包助记词
app_settings.networks_desc: 添加并编辑自定义 RPC 网络
app_settings.conversion_desc: 在整个应用程序中使用特定货币显示法币价值。
app_settings.primary_currency_desc: 选择“原生”可优先以链的原生货币（如 ETH）显示值。选择“法币”可优先以您选定的法币显示值。
app_settings.language_desc: 将应用程序翻译成其他受支持的语言。
app_settings.engine_desc: 更改在 URL 栏中输入搜索词时所使用的默认搜索引擎。
app_settings.reset_desc: 此操作将清除您的交易历史记录。这些数据可能无法恢复。
app_settings.rpc_desc: 通过 URL 使用支持自定义 RPC 的网络，而不是所提供的网络之一。
app_settings.hex_desc: 选择此项可在发送屏幕上显示十六进制数据字段。
app_settings.clear_privacy_desc: 清除隐私数据，以便所有网站必须再次请求查看账户信息的访问权限。
app_settings.clear_history_desc: 选择此选项可清除您的整个浏览历史记录。
app_settings.clear_cookies_desc: 选择此选项可清除您的浏览器的 Cookie。
app_settings.metametrics_description: 参加 MetaMetrics 以帮助我们改进 MetaMask。
app_settings.third_party_description: 第三方 API (Etherscan) 用于显示历史记录中的传入交易。如果您不希望我们通过这些服务拉取数据，请关闭。
app_settings.metametrics_restart_required: 您需要重启应用才能使更改生效。
app_settings.failed_to_fetch_chain_id: Could not fetch chain ID. Is your RPC URL correct?
app_settings.endpoint_returned_different_chain_id: The endpoint returned a different chain ID: %{chainIdReturned}
app_settings.chain_id_required: The chain ID is required. It must match the chain ID returned by the network. You can enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_hex_number_leading_zeros: Invalid hexadecimal number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number: Invalid number. Enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_number_leading_zeros: Invalid number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number_range: Invalid number. Enter a number between 1 and %{maxSafeChainId}
app_settings.hide_zero_balance_tokens_desc: Prevents tokens with no balance from displaying in your token listing.
app_settings.token_detection_description: We use third-party APIs to detect and display new tokens sent to your wallet. Turn off if you don’t want the app to pull data from those services.

seed_phrase_explanation: full access to your wallet, funds and accounts.
you are the owner of your SRP.
reveal_credential.private_key_explanation: 将它保存在安全、秘密的地方。
reveal_credential.private_key_warning: 这是当前选定账户的私钥：{{accountName}}。请勿泄露此密钥。任何得到您的私钥的人都可以完全控制您的账户，包括转走所有资金。
seed_phrase_warning_explanation: Make sure nobody is looking at your screen.
MetaMask Support will never request this.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning_explanation: 请勿泄露此密钥。任何得到您的私钥的人都可以完全控制您的账户，包括转走所有资金。
seed_phrase_modal:
full access to your wallet and funds.

Do not share this with anyone.
MetaMask Support will not request this,
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_copied_ios: Secret Recovery Phrase temporarily copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_copied_android: Secret Recovery Phrase copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.unknown_error: 无法解锁您的账户。请重试。
reveal_credential.seed_warning: 这是您的钱包的 12 字助记词。此助记词可用来控制您当前和未来的所有账户，还能够转走其中的所有资金。请妥善保管此助记词，不要告诉任何人。

password_reset.password_desc: 选择一个强密码来解锁您设备上的 MetaMask 应用。如果丢失密码，您将需要助记词来重新导入钱包。

account_details.title: 账户详细信息
account_details.view_account: 在 Etherscan 上查看账户
account_details.account_copied_to_clipboard: 公共地址已复制到剪贴板

qr_scanner.invalid_qr_code_message: 您尝试扫描的二维码无效。
qr_scanner.allow_camera_dialog_message: 我们需要您的许可才能扫描二维码
qr_scanner.attempting_to_scan_with_wallet_locked: Looks like you're trying to scan a QR code, you need to unlock your wallet to be able to use it.
qr_scanner.attempting_sync_from_wallet_error: 好像您正尝试与扩展程序同步。要进行同步，请转至“设置”>“高级”>“与 MetaMask 扩展程序同步”

transaction.this_is_an_advanced: This is an advanced feature used to cancel or speed up any pending transactions.
transaction.think_of_the_nonce: Think of the nonce as the transaction number of an account. Every account's nonce begins with 0 for the first transaction and continues in sequential order.
transaction.nonce_warning: Warning: You may encounter issues with future transactions if you continue. Use with caution.
transaction.insufficient_amount: You need {{amount}} more {{tokenSymbol}} to complete this transaction.
transaction.high_gas_price: Your gas fee may be set unnecessarily high ({{currentGasPrice}}). Consider lowering the amount.
transaction.invalid_collectible_ownership: 您并不是此收藏品的所有者
transaction.no_address_for_ens: 无 ENS 名称的地址
transaction.approve_warning: 批准此操作，即表示您准许此合约最多支出
transaction.cancel_tx_message: 提交此尝试不能保证将会取消您的初始交易。如果取消尝试成功，将向您收取以上交易费。
transaction.speedup_tx_message: 提交此尝试不能保证将会加速您的初始交易。如果加速尝试成功，将向您收取以上交易费。
transaction.not_enough_for_gas: 您的账户中有 0 {{ticker}} 可用于支付交易费。购买一些 {{ticker}} 或从其他账户存入。
transaction.tokenContractAddressWarning_3: .如果将代币发送到此地址，您将失去代币。
transaction.smartContractAddressWarning: 此地址是智能合约地址。请确保您了解此地址的用途，否则您将面临资金损失风险。
transaction.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction.gas_education_4: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexitity.
transaction.confusable_msg: We have detected a confusable character in the ENS name. Check the ENS name to avoid a potential scam.
transaction.dapp_suggested_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. It’s using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate. However, editing this gas fee may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.
transaction.dapp_suggested_eip1559_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. Overriding this may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.

custom_gas.warning_gas_limit: Gas 限额必须大于 20999、小于 7920027
custom_gas.warning_gas_limit_estimated: Estimated gas limit is {{gas}}, use it as minimum value
custom_gas.cost_explanation: 选择您愿意支付的网络费。费用越高，您的交易得到处理的几率越大、速度越快。

spend_limit_edition.title: 编辑权限
spend_limit_edition.allow_explanation: 最高提取和支付以下数额：
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_site: 您是否信任此站点？授予此权限，即表示您允许此站点访问您的资金。
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_address: 您是否信任此地址？授予此权限，即表示您允许此地址访问您的资金。
spend_limit_edition.details_explanation: {{host}} 最多可从该账户访问并支付此最大数额。
spend_limit_edition.all_set_desc: 您已成功为此站点设置权限。

browser.title: 浏览器
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask 是您的钱包和去中心化网络浏览器。随便看看！
browser.no_tabs_desc: 要浏览去中心化网络，请添加新标签页
browser.failed_to_resolve_ens_name: 我们无法解析该 ENS 名称
browser.remove_bookmark_msg: 是否确实想要从您的收藏夹中删除此站点？

transactions.hash_copied_to_clipboard: 交易哈希已复制到剪贴板
transactions.address_to_placeholder: 搜索、公共地址 (0x) 或 ENS
transactions.import_wallet_tip: All future transactions made from this device will include a label "from this device" next to the timestamp. For transactions dated before adding the account, this history will not indicate which outgoing transactions originated from this device.

address_book.add_this_address: 将此地址添加至您的通讯簿。
address_book.name: 名称

sync_with_extension.title: 从扩展程序同步数据
sync_with_extension.label: 在您的桌面浏览器中打开 MetaMask 扩展程序，然后转至“设置”>“高级”，单击“与手机同步”，然后输入您的密码以查看二维码
sync_with_extension.please_wait: 请稍候，我们正在同步您的数据...
sync_with_extension.warning_message: 这将覆盖您手机里的所有当前账户和交易历史记录。您确定吗？
sync_with_extension.invalid_qr_code_desc: 这不是正确的二维码！要与浏览器扩展程序同步，请转至浏览器扩展程序中的“设置”>“高级”>“与手机同步”，然后扫描其中的二维码
sync_with_extension.outdated_qr_code_desc: 好像这是已过期的二维码！请尝试扫描新二维码
sync_with_extension.something_wrong_desc: 我们在尝试与您的钱包同步时遇到问题。请稍后重试或使用助记词导入您的钱包
sync_with_extension.allow_biometrics_desc: 您可以使用 {{biometrics}} 在 MetaMask 上进行身份验证

sync_with_extension_success.title: 已导入钱包
sync_with_extension_success.sync_complete_1: 切记，如果您丢失助记词，MetaMask 无法帮助您找回。您可以在以下位置找到助记词：
sync_with_extension_success.password_tip: 用于解锁移动钱包的密码与您为扩展程序设置的密码相同。

signature_request.title: 签名请求
signature_request.eth_sign_warning: 谨慎行事。此操作有可能用来从您的账户提取资产。确保您信任此站点。

biometrics.enable_touchid: 使用 Touch ID 登录？
biometrics.enable_faceid: 使用 Face ID 登录？
biometrics.enable_device_passcode_android: 使用设备 PIN 登录？

authentication.auth_prompt_desc: 请进行身份验证以便使用 MetaMask
authentication.fingerprint_prompt_desc: 使用您的指纹解锁 MetaMask

accountApproval.title: 连接请求
accountApproval.warning: 单击“连接”即表示您允许此去中心化应用查看您的公共地址。这是保护您的数据防范网络钓鱼风险的重要安全步骤。

import_private_key.title: 导入账户
import_private_key.description_one: 导入的账户可在您的钱包中查看，但无法通过 MetaMask 助记词找回。
import_private_key.learn_more_here: 在此处详细了解导入的账户。
import_private_key.subtitle: 粘贴您的私钥字符串
import_private_key.error_message: 我们无法导入该私钥。请确保输入正确。

import_private_key_success.title: 账户导入成功！
import_private_key_success.description_one: 您现在将能够在 MetaMask 中查看您的账户。

secure_your_wallet.title: 保护您的钱包安全
secure_your_wallet.info_text_1: 用几分钟时间完成 MetaMask 钱包的设置。
secure_your_wallet.info_text_2: 这将确保只有您才可以访问自己的资金，还可以在丢失设备时找回自己的钱包

account_backup_step_1.title: 保护您的钱包安全
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_1: 不要冒丢失资金的风险。在信任的地点保存您的
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_4: 如果您被应用锁定或换新设备，这是找回钱包的唯一途径。
account_backup_step_1.skip_check: 我了解丢失助记词后将无法访问钱包。
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_1: 助记词是一组 12 个字词，包含与您的钱包相关的所有信息，包括您的资金。它像是用来访问整个钱包的一组密码。
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_2: 您必须确保助记词保密、安全。如果有人得到您的助记词，他们将能够控制您的账户。
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_3: 将它保存在只有您能够接触的地方。一旦丢失，即使是 MetaMask 也无法帮您找回。

account_backup_step_1B.title: 保护您的钱包安全
account_backup_step_1B.manual_subtitle: 在一张纸上写下您的助记词并将其存放在安全的地方。
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_1: 不要冒丢失资金的风险。在信任的地点保存您的助记词，以此保护您的钱包。
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_2: 如果您被应用锁定或换新设备，这是找回钱包的唯一途径。

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: 我们强烈建议您保存助记词，以便恢复钱包。
account_backup_step_2.title: 拿起笔和纸
account_backup_step_2.info: 下一步是写下您的助记词。

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: 我们强烈建议您保存助记词，以便恢复钱包。
account_backup_step_3.title: 有人在看吗？
account_backup_step_3.info_text: 确保其他人或机器人没有看您的屏幕。如果有人复制您的助记词，可能会在其他设备上窃取您的资金

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: 我们强烈建议您保存助记词，以便恢复钱包。
account_backup_step_4.title: 您的助记词
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: 在纸上认真记下这些字词。它们的顺序十分重要。
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: 您将需要在下一屏幕上重新输入
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: 在继续之前，我们需要您确认自己的密码

account_backup_step_5.error_message: 字词的顺序不正确。请确保您在纸上的记录正确无误，需要的话可以返回上一屏幕
account_backup_step_5.title: 确认助记词
account_backup_step_5.info_text: 按照前一屏幕上呈现的顺序插入每个字词。
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: 这是为了确保您遵守该安全措施

account_backup_step_6.title: 安全提示
account_backup_step_6.info_text: 如果您丢失助记词，MetaMask 无法找回
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: 为助记词保留多个备份
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: 在信任的密码管理器中保存助记词，并在安全的地方存放纸质备份
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: 切勿将此助记词告诉他人
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * 您可以在以下位置找到助记词：
account_backup_step_6.modal_text: 您已完全备份，整装待发！
account_backup_step_6.copy_seed_phrase: 将助记词复制到剪贴板

manual_backup_step_1.info: 这是您的助记词。将它写在纸上并存放在安全的地方。您将需要在下一步中重新输入此助记词（按顺序）。
manual_backup_step_1.watching: 确保没有人在看您的屏幕。
manual_backup_step_1.before_continiuing: 在继续之前，我们需要您确认自己的密码

manual_backup_step_2.info: 按照之前呈现的顺序选择每个字词。

manual_backup_step_3.success: 您已成功保护自己的钱包。记住妥善保管您的助记词，这是您的责任！
manual_backup_step_3.recover: 如果您丢失助记词，MetaMask 无法找回您的钱包。您可在“设置”>“安全和隐私”中找到助记词。
manual_backup_step_3.leave_hint: 给自己留下提示。写下您的保存位置，提醒自己如何找到它。这些信息不会离开您的设备。
manual_backup_step_3.no_seedphrase: 不要在这里写您的助记词。

phishing.ethereum_phishing_detector: 以太坊网络钓鱼检测器
phishing.intro: 当前在 MetaMask 域警告列表中。这意味着根据我们可用的信息，MetaMask 认为此域当前可能会损害您的安全，因此，作为一项额外的安全功能，MetaMask 已限制访问此站点。要忽略此提醒，请阅读此警告的剩余部分，了解关于如何自负风险继续的说明。
phishing.reasons: 站点出现在我们的警告列表中有很多原因，而且我们的警告列表是根据其他广泛使用的行业列表编制的。这些原因可能包括已知欺诈或安全风险，如测试结果为阳性的域
phishing.list_content: 这些警告列表中的域可能包括完全恶意的网站以及被恶意行为者破坏的合法网站。
phishing.to_read_more: 要阅读此站点的更多信息，
phishing.review_on_etherscam: 请在 Etherscam 上查看该域。
phishing.warning: 注意，此警告列表是在自愿基础上编制的。此列表可能不准确或不完整。单凭域未出现在此列表中，并不是该域安全的隐性担保。一如既往，您的交易由您自己负责。如果您希望与我们警告列表中的任何域交互，您可以自负风险
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: 如果您认为此域标记错误，或者被拦截的合法网站已解决其安全问题，

step_1.title: Before you purchase ETH, understand gas fees
step_1.subtitle_1: If you plan to swap or transfer your ETH, purchase extra to cover gas fees.
step_1.subtitle_2: Gas fees for transactions are separate from the cost of purchasing ETH.
step_1.subtitle_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_2.title: What are gas fees?
step_2.subtitle_1: Gas powers transactions on the Ethereum network. It’s a fee paid in ETH to the crypto miners who process your transactions.
step_2.subtitle_2: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_3.title: How much do I need?
step_3.subtitle_1: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and type of transaction.
step_3.subtitle_2: A complex transaction like “swapping” may cost 5x - 10x more than a “send” transaction.
step_3.subtitle_3: The best way to estimate gas fees is to
step_3.subtitle_5: and see how much gas costs.

swaps.feature_off_body: MetaMask Swaps is undergoing maintenance. Please check back later.
swaps.wrong_network_body: You’re only able to swap tokens on the Ethereum Main Network.
swaps.unallowed_asset_body: Some tokens with unique mechanics are currently not supported for swapping.
swaps.verify_on: Always verify the token address on
swaps.added_manually: This token has been added manually.
swaps.make_sure_trade: and make sure this is the token you want to trade.
swaps.token_multiple: Multiple tokens can use the same name and symbol.
swaps.token_to_verify: to verify this is the token you're looking for.
swaps.manually_pasting: Manually add a token by pasting its address.
swaps.token_address_can_be_found: Token contract addresses can be found on
swaps.error_gathering_token_details: Oops, there was an error gathering token details.
swaps.add_warning: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
swaps.not_enough: Not enough {{symbol}} to complete this swap
swaps.slippage_info: If the rate changes between the time your order is placed and confirmed it’s called “slippage”. Your Swap will automatically cancel if slippage exceeds your “max slippage” setting.
swaps.slippage_warning: Make sure you know what you’re doing!
swaps.more_gas_to_complete: more for gas to complete this swap.
swaps.market_price_unavailable: Market price is unavailable and price impact is therefore unknown. Please verify that you are comfortable with the amount of tokens you will receive before swapping.
swaps.price_difference_body: The difference in market prices can be affected by fees taken by intermediaries, size of market, size of trade, or market inefficiencies.
swaps.price_impact_body: Price impact is the difference between the current market price and the amount received during transaction execution. Price impact is a function of the size of your trade relative to the size of the liquidity pool.
swaps.quotes_update_often_text: Quotes are updated often to reflect current market conditions.

fee_text.fee_is_applied: A fee of {{fee}} is automatically factored into each quote, which supports ongoing development to make MetaMask even better.

quote_source_dex.1: This quote comes directly from a

quote_source_rfq.3: who responds with a quote directly.

quote_source_agg.3: which finds the best price by splitting your order between different decentralized exchanges.

quote_source_cnt.1: This quote comes directly from a
quote_source_cnt.3: that wraps and unwraps native tokens which can save on gas costs.

swaps.request_new_quotes: Please request new quotes to get the latest best rate.
swaps.try_adjusting: Try adjusting the amount and try again.
swaps.unexpected_error: There has been an unexpected error, please request new quotes to get the latest best rate. (error: {{error}})
swaps.medium_selected_warning: Swaps are time sensitive. “Medium” is not reccomended.
swaps.high_recommendation: Swaps are typically time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential losses due to changes in market conditions.
swaps.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
swaps.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
swaps.gas_education_6: is what we expect the actual fee to be. The exact amount depends on network conditions.
swaps.gas_education_8: is the most you’ll spend. When the network is volatile this can be a large amount.

error_screen.submit_ticket_1: 请报告此问题，以便我们能够修复它：

error_screen.save_seedphrase_3: 并重新安装应用。注：没有助记词将无法恢复钱包。

invalid_network.hint: You can find the chain IDs of most popular networks on

switch_custom_network.switch_warning: This will switch the selected network within MetaMask to a prevously added network:
switch_custom_network.available: is now available in the network selector.

add_custom_network.title: Allow this site to add a network?
add_custom_network.warning: This allows this network to be used within MetaMask.
add_custom_network.warning_subtext_1: MetaMask does not verify custom networks or their security.
add_custom_network.unrecognized_chain: This custom network is not recongized
add_custom_network.invalid_chain: The %{rpcUrl} for this Chain ID does not match the chainid.network listing

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.swaps_warning: Swaps are very time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential loses due to changes in market conditions.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.priority_fee_at_least_0_error: Priority fee must be at least 1 GWEI

learn_more.title: How should I choose?
learn_more.intro: Selecting the right gas fee depends on the type of transaction and how important it is to you.
learn_more.high_text: This is best for time sensitive transactions (like Swaps) as it increases the likelihood of a successful transaction. If a Swap takes too long to process it may fail and result in losing some of your gas fee.
learn_more.medium_text: A medium gas fee is good for sending, withdrawing or other non-time sensitive transactions. This setting will most often result in a successful transaction.
learn_more.low_text: A low gas fee should only be used for unimportant transactions or when network traffic is very low. With a lower fee it can be hard to predict when (or if) your transaction will be successful.

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_low: Max Priority Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_high: Max Priority Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_speed_up_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_cancel_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_low: Max Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_high: Max Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_speed_up_low: Max Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_cancel_low: Max Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Max priority fee” and “Max fee”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_priority_fee: Max priority fee (aka “miner tip”) goes directly to miners and incentivizes them to prioritize your transaction. You’ll most often pay your max setting.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_fee: The max fee is the most you’ll pay (base fee + priority fee).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_new_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 10% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_cancel_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 50% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit_legacy: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Gas price”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_price: This network requires a “Gas price” field when submitting a transaction. Gas price is the maximum amount you are willing to pay per unit of gas.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_low: Gas price is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_high: Gas price is higher than necessary

transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_4: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_5: Gas fees are set by the network and fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexity.
transaction_review_eip1559.legacy_gas_suggestion_tooltip: This gas fee suggestion is using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate.

times_eip1559.warning_unknown: Your max fee or max priority fee may be low for current market conditions. We don’t know when (or if) your transaction will be processed.
times_eip1559.warning_low: This lowers your maximum fee but if network traffic increases your transaction may be delayed or fail.

review_prompt.mobile_sentiment: How do you feel about MetaMask mobile?
review_prompt.help_description_1: We're here to help! Check out the FAQs below or
